name: Guns & Bricks
description:
Put bricks up to reach the red square. Use the gun if a brick gets in your way.

-- Controls --

LEFT or RIGHT: arrows

JUMP: space bar

BRICK: B

SHOOT: V

-- Infos --

This game was made in 48h for Ludum Dare 31.

Everything made by: @tmalicet

Made with HaxeFlixel
